We convert time into money through work.  Money = stored time.   We trade our most scarce asset for something less scarce.   Scarcity can be measured through stock to flow ratio (inverse of inflation)  USD: 20:1 Gold: 50:1  Bitcoin: ~25:1 but trending towards infinite

For the first time ever, there is a money whose scarcity will equal that of time.   I believe people will eventually realize the importance of this and start storing their time in bitcoin.   If not, you give government the ability to steal your most scarce asset  #stackingsats
